name: Wars of Fortune
description: A self-initiated project, created in a partnership with a developer. Our team of two people conceptualised and created an ambitious mobile game app for Android smartphones and tablets, which is available at the Google Play Store. The gameâ€™s genre is MMORPG (Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing game) with gameplay based on users interacting with one another. The game is free to download with optional in-game purchases and requires constant internet connection to play.
